page.title: 07SCOUTING IN SLEAFORD
page.content:
THERE ARE 3 SCOUTING GROUPS IN SLEAFORD.THEY ARE THE CUB SCOUTS,THE SCOUTS AND THE MILLERS VENTURE SCOUT UNIT. THE CUBS MEET ON A THURSDAY NIGHT AT ABOUT 6pm TILL ABOUT 7.30pm THEN THE SCOUTS COME FROM 7.30pm TILL 9pm. THE SCOUT HUT IS AT THE REFORM PLACE. ON FRIDAY NIGHTS THE VENTURE SCOUTS MEET AT 8pm AND FINISH ABOUT 10pm. THE MILLERS VENTURE SCOUTS RUN A GO-CART CLUB CALLED {LINCOLNSHIRE {GO-CART CLUB}THIS CLUB IS RUN BY JEFF BENT AND NEIL ONION.THEY ALSO RUN THE VENTURE SCOUT UNIT.THE MILLERS VENTURES ALSO GO TO INTERNATIONAL JAMBORIES e.g. CANADA,HOLLAND AND ESSEX.
{BY WAYNE BRIDGMAN(AGE 15).}
